670450.name: MAGIX Audio Cleaning Lab 2017 Steam Edition
670450.description:
MAGIX Audio Cleaning Lab 2017 – Steam Edition offers everything for recording, editing, cutting and converting your audio files. 
Restore and perfect your own recordings, old records and more. Easy operation, thematic sound settings with high-quality effects, automatic audio restoration and professional tools such as spectral display make this software the top choice for achieving an outstanding sound experience.

The Multitool For Your Audio Data

Speech Recordings
Simply connect a microphone and record your own audio commentaries for videos and podcasts. With a range of filters, you can improve vocal clarity, minimize "s" sounds and reduce clipping - fully automatically if you like.
Record Audio Media 
Easily record vinyl, cassettes and other media to your computer. On import, the title information and CD cover will automatically be added through the Internet.
Audio Editing
Professional tools, editing functions, effects, filters and automations make editing and restoring audio easier than ever before.
Sound Optimization
Easily remove hissing, crackling, wind noise and other disturbances using one of over 290 presets. Remove noise with the wide range of precise and effective presets. The search function always helps you to find the right tool.
Convert Audio Files
Easily convert audio files into any standard format and save them on a smartphone, tablet, hard drive or CD.
Optimize Smartphone Recordings
Settings for specific devices, conversion from mono to stereo or freshening up vocals: You can optimize audio recordings from mobile devices quickly and easily.

Highlights:

  •  Noise removal: With the help of over 290 presets
  •  Detailed editing: Direct access to all effects settings
  •  Digitize music: Record music from vinyl, cassettes & CDs
  •  Digitize audio media: Easily transfer music to your computer
  •  Spectral display: Correct noise precisely
  •  4K & HD monitors: For brilliant display on high-resolution devices
  •  Audio converter: For all standard formats
  •  Music titles & CD covers: Automatic retrieval over the Internet

Automatic Audio Restauration
The Auto Cleaning feature analyzes the audio quality of music and speech recordings and improves them automatically.

Visualizations for Audio Analysis
Visual aids help you identify problem areas when working with frequencies or volume levels.

Easily Share Recordings Online
Direct export to YouTube, Facebook, SoundCloud and showfy. 

Intelligent Search Function
Search and find straight away: Enter a search term and relevant help texts, templates and effects will be displayed.

This program is specifically designed for easy audio editing and sound optimization. For creative music production or complex recording sessions, we recommend MAGIX Music Maker or Samplitude Music Studio. These products are also available on Steam.
